item.description:
Please read the entire description before RSVPing. Do not RSVP unless you are certain you can attend.

This will be a low key, no frills, potluck-ish game night. Cards, Taboo, etc. I'll supply the games. Everyone attending must bring either food (something easy to share) or a drink (juice, soda, adult beverage). Please indicate what you plan to bring during the RSVP process.

The location will be at my place in Dorchester a couple minutes away from Franklin Park near Columbia and Washington. The address will be emailed to those that RSVP. Street parking is available and it is a 7 minute walk from the 16, 22, 23, 28, and 29 buses. (Update: I've emailed the address to the RSVP list, if you did not receive it then let me know)


If you RSVP and can no longer attend, update your status ASAP. Since this is a limited space event, it is unfair to unnecessarily hold a spot. A couple of my friends may drop by but this is primarily for meetup folks.

List of items members are tentatively bringing:

  • Wine and possibly a sweet potato pie
  • Cocktail patties
  • Adult beverage (4)
  • Juice
  • Snack, pretzels and chips
  • Soda
  • Cookies
  • Pastelitos
  • Beef patties
  • Sangria and pasta salad
item.how_to_find_us: Address will be emailed to RSVP list
item.name: Game and Chill Night - House location
